segments.text: Sounds like an Italian name with an “ i ” at the end .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Admit it . You just think of Mussolini .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm an art lover , so I think more of Bellini and Botticelli !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes . The Italians do love the sensual forms of the human body .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't we all ... hey ! Your cousin sells gift items ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah-all from Italy . See all the saints ? They're important to Roman Catholics .
segments.speaker: S1
